title: Abdollah Nasseri
text:
Abdollah Nasseri () is an Iranian <a href="Football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28football%29">defender</a> who currently plays for Iranian football club <a href="Tractor%20S.C.">Tractor S.C.</a> in the <a href="Persian%20Gulf%20Pro%20League">Persian Gulf Pro League</a>.
Club career.
Foolad.
Nasseri was a main player in <a href="Foolad%20Novin%20F.C.">Foolad Novin</a> in 2014–15 Azadegan League. In summer 2015 he promoted to <a href="Foolad%20F.C.">Foolad</a> and signed contract until 2018. He made his debut for <a href="Foolad%20F.C.">Foolad</a> on December 18, 2015 against <a href="Gostaresh%20Foolad%20F.C.">Gostaresh Foolad</a> as a starter.
